choices.C: The state file does not match the current infrastructure.
choices.A: The code contains tabs for indentation instead of spaces.
choices.B: There is a missing value for a variable.

questions.question_text: Which syntax check errors when you run terraform validate?

discussion.content:

it only checks syntax error

Selected Answer: D

Selected Answer: A
it does check the syntax only

Selected Answer: D
missing value gets through, state is irrelevant, the other one is fmt. but for real the missing value gets through, although if you try to use the variable in a block then it yields an error.

missing value is not a syntax issue

questions.question_text: Terraform encrypts sensitive values stored in your state file.
When should you run terraform init?

discussion.content: C. After you start coding a new Terraform project and before you run terraform plan for the first time

choices.C: After you start coding a new Terraform project and before you run terraform plan for the first time
choices.A: Every time you run terraform apply
choices.B: After you run terraform plan for the first time in a new Terraform project and before you run terraform apply
choices.D: Before you start coding a new Terraform project

questions.question_text:
You are making changes to existing Terraform code to add some new infrastructure.

When is the best time to run terraform validate?

discussion.content: B. Before you run terraform plan so you can validate your code syntax

choices.A: After you run terraform plan so you can validate that your state file is consistent with your infrastructure
choices.B: Before you run terraform plan so you can validate your code syntax
choices.C: Before you run terraform apply so you can validate your infrastructure
choices.D: After you run terraform apply so you can validate your provider credentials

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
The terraform fmt command is used to rewrite Terraform configuration files to a canonical format and style. This command applies a subset of the Terraform language style conventions, along with other minor adjustments for readability.

questions.question_text: Which of these commands makes your code more human readable?
